caption_original: Happy International Day of Forests! The health and well-being of our nation’s forests matters. Canada is proud of its world-recognized forest management practices. The Government of Canada is committed to the sustainable management of its forests so as to maintain their environmental, social and economic values and benefits over time.

caption_original: Forests are a dominant feature of Canada’s landscape and are central to its economy. Forests enrich the lives of all Canadians, offer a place of sanctuary and recreation and are fundamental to the cultural and spiritual values of Indigenous peoples. Forests provide habitat for wildlife, moderate climate and filter air and water. On International Day of Forests, March , take a moment to Celebrate Canada’s forests.
